Catalonia 2017 Local Election polltracker images

  • Select a size: small or medium
  • To update the images, run `buildbot build catalonia-polltracker`
  • Drop the link into Methode or into an img tag on an ig page to use the picture (the link is to an svg image hosted in S3)

small.svg

http://ft-ig-content-prod.s3-website-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/v2/ft-interactive/catalonia-polltracker/master/catalonia-latest-small.svg ,

medium.svg

http://ft-ig-content-prod.s3-website-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/v2/ft-interactive/catalonia-polltracker/master/catalonia-latest-medium.svg
